name: Diagnosis Dilemma
description:
Diagnosis Dilemma is a cooperative communication game for two player as they attempt to diagnose and cure fictional infectious diseases. One player takes the role of Laboratory Scientist(PC) and the other takes the role of Researcher(Booklet). Both players have access to information the other does not, So they must work together to cure the Infection.

This game was made for Global Game Jam 2018 in Brisbane

https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/diagnosis-dilemma
